charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1101_0100_2:
Hugh and [Name:PlayerNickname ] witnessed
Team Break committing a crime.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1101_0200_2:
The two of them joined forces and had Team Break
backed into a corner.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_0500_1: You think we’re just gonna do what you say?
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_0600_1:
Go catch some Pokémon to replace
it yourselves!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_0800_1:
People and Pokémon are hurting because you’ve
torn them apart.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_0900_1:
On their behalf, I won’t let you get away
with this!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_1000_1:
I won’t forgive you for hurting the hearts of
Pokémon and people!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_1100_1:
What a fool! Why are you all worked up over
one stolen Pokémon?!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_1200_1:
What a hassle! Here, do whatever
you want with the Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_1300_1:
Do you think they’ll try to steal people’s
Pokémon again?
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_1400_1: Oh well, no use thinking about that right now.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_1500_1:
We need to hurry and return this Pokémon to
its Trainer.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_1600_1: Be more careful next time, got it?
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_1700_1: Got it! Thank you so much for saving them!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_0401_1900_1:
Me too. Now that I’ve seen their smiling faces, I
can rest easy.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_0402_2100_1:
Look who’s talking! I saw you grinning ear to ear
while you were watching, too!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_2200_1:
That’s the way it should be between people
and Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_2300_1:
Nobody has the right to separate partners from
each other.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_2400_1: The only reason I was able to protect them...
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_2500_1: was thanks to you two and Bouffalant!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_2600_1: You were as reliable as ever, partner!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_2700_1: I met Bouffalant while traveling through Unova.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_2800_1:
He’s always lent me his strength. He’s the
best partner!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_2900_1:
No matter the opponent, he would take them
head on.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_3000_1:
Just fighting alongside him gives me motivation
and courage!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_0401_3200_1: What a nice thing to say!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_0302_3300_1:
Maybe your partner feels the same
way about you.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_0402_3400_1: Sounds like you know what you’re talking about!
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_3500_1: You and your partner seem to get along well, too.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_3600_1: You’re both in sync, just like us.
charaepi_ch0147_00_hugh/2301_1201_3900_1:
Rosa and Nate would help you any time, any
place, and I’ll do the same!
